name: Queen's Labyrinth
description:
This is a anime-themed small casual maze adventure game.

Navigate a perilous labyrinth to get the Queen's heart back.

Use WASD to move, hold Space to crawl.

Crawling allows you to move with reduced speed and not hit by bullets

Happy April Fool's day!
